title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When attempting to copy a package in project 'A' using the package viewer in Eclipse's jdt.ui plugin, the destination shown is incorrect. Selecting 'xxx' as the destination package results in an unexpected destination.
OB: When copying a package in Eclipse's jdt.ui plugin, the destination shown is 'xx' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
EB: The destination shown when copying a package should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project 'A'. 
2. Open the package viewer. 
3. Select a package in project 'A'. 
4. From the context menu, choose 'Copy'. 
5. Check the destination package shown in the copy dialog.
